FuncDef: The display license resource usage command displays the usage of active resource items in a license file. The display license resource usage command displays the usage of active resource items in a license file.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed resource usage, including the usage of sales items and control items.
-

ExtraInfo:
To check the usage of active resource items in a GTL file, run the display license resource usage command.
Resource usage indicates the ratio of used resources to those authorized by the GTL file.
